result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devin John Rounds

11:07 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Devin John Rounds appeared by phone.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson appeared by video for Devin John Rounds.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Erickson is heard on the status of the case.
Jury status hearing scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Jury status hearing on December 1, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

9:36 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Devin John Rounds appeared by phone.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson appeared by video for Devin John Rounds.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Erickson is heard on the status of the case. Offer received, needs to go over with Defendant. Requests a breakout room.
9:37 AM Breakout room 
9:42 AM Court resumes.
Jury status hearing scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury status hearing on October 27, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury status hearing on September 29, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Jury Status Hearing of 8/26/22 is moved to 9/29/22 at 9:30 AM at the court's request.  No objection by Attys Erickson or Steiner.  New notice of the date/time change provided.

ADDRESS INFO for Devin John Rounds
Current: 43351 Circle Drive, Boscobel, WI 53805-8210 United States  (Effective: 05-17-2022)
Prior: 29974 CTH E, Muscoda, WI 53573

2:34 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Devin John Rounds in court.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson in court for Devin John Rounds.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Defendant states understanding.  
Atty Erickson waives reading of the information. Defendant will stand mute, upon defendant standing mute clerk will enter a not guilty plea into the record as to each count.
Jury status hearing scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury status hearing on August 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:50 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Devin John Rounds appeared by phone.  Attorney Jeffrey Warren Erickson in court for Devin John Rounds.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Def is heard on transportation issues. Court moves initial appearance to next week.
Initial appearance scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Initial appearance on May 16, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:43 PM Defendant Devin John Rounds not in court, Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
     Hearing set for 2:30 p.m.; no appearance.  State requests a warrant.  
     Court authorizes a warrant with a bond amount of an additional $150.00 bond.
     Court concludes at 2:44 p.m.

11:56 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Devin J. Rounds appeared by video, Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Court finds probable cause.  
DA Requests $100.00 cash bond.  Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if positive submit to blood draw. 
Court Orders $100.00 cash bond.  Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if positive submit to blood draw.
Def Comments. 
Court advises of right to an attorney.
Hearing scheduled for January 24, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
